hero.title: Premium Car Rental Service
hero.description: Experience the freedom of the road with our extensive fleet of vehicles. Book your perfect ride today and enjoy hassle-free travel.

auth.signInDescription: Sign in or create an account to start booking your perfect vehicle. Enjoy exclusive benefits, faster checkout, and personalized recommendations.

features.wideSelectionDesc: From economy cars to luxury SUVs, find the perfect vehicle for your needs.
features.flexibleBookingDesc: Choose your pickup and return dates with our easy-to-use booking system.
features.multiplePaymentDesc: Pay with cash, bank transfer, or credit/debit cards for your convenience.

booking.title: Book Your Perfect Ride
booking.description: Select from our premium fleet of vehicles and customize your rental experience.

airportTransfer.title: Airport transfers made
airportTransfer.subtitle: surprisingly easy and enjoyable!
airportTransfer.bookingTitle: Book your airport taxi transfer. Worldwide.
airportTransfer.from: From: Airport, hotel, station, port, address...
airportTransfer.to: To: Airport, hotel, station, port, address...

step1.title: Schedule in advance
step1.description: Schedule a time and pick up location to bring you to your destination.

step2.title: Vehicle options
step2.description: Choose a car type and options to make your trip enjoyable.

step3.title: Pay and relax
step3.description: No hidden costs. Pay via trusted partners. No worries, we have a cancellation policy.

vehicleSelector.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search term

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our Service
whyChoose.premiumVehiclesDesc: Our fleet includes the latest models with top-notch features and comfort.
whyChoose.flexibleBookingDesc: Easy booking process with options to modify or cancel your reservation.
whyChoose.securePaymentsDesc: Multiple payment options with secure processing and transparent pricing.
